text: Eghtɨ nguazir Jerusalemɨn boroghɨn itim, a voroghɨra itir danganir zarimɨn otogham, a notɨn amadaghan Geban nguibar ekiamɨn ikegh, mangɨ sautɨn amadaghan Rimonɨn nguibar ekiamɨn otogham. Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamra mɨghsɨatam gisɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ Jerusalem avɨnamin dɨvazir bar mɨtiar gavgavim, a fomɨra ikezɨ moghɨra, a kamaghɨra ikiam. Jerusalemɨn dɨvazim, a Benjaminɨn Tiar Akamɨn ikegh mangɨ, Mɨkebamɨn Tiar Akamɨn otogham, danganir kam tiar akar mam fomɨra iti. Egh ababanir mɨtaghniar Hananelɨn Tauan ikegh mangamim, a mangɨ me atrivim bagha wainɨn ingarir danganimɨn otogham.
